mapper.select: select m.id id , m.title title , date_format(m.created_time, '%Y-%m-%d %h-%i-%s') createtime , case m.status when 1 then '审核中' when 2 then '审核通过' when 3 then '审核失败' end sign , count(a.id) num from m_question_info m left join m_answer_info a on m.id = a.question_id where m.created_id = #{memberid} limit #{start} , #{pageSize}

select q.id id , q.title ,a.content answerContent, count(distinct a.id) answerNum from m_question_info q left join m_answer_info a on q.id = a.question_id and a.deleted = 0 and a.status = 2 left join m_question_type t on q.quest_type_id = t.id and t.deleted = 0 where q.deleted = 0 and q.status = 2
and t.name like concat(#{name} , '%')
and q.title like concat('%', #{title} , '%')
order by q.created_time desc limit #{start} , #{pageSize}

select q.id id , q.title from m_question_info q left join m_answer_info a on q.id = a.question_id and a.deleted = 0 and a.status = 2 left join m_question_type t on q.quest_type_id = t.id and t.deleted = 0 where q.deleted = 0 and q.status = 2 order by q.created_time desc limit 0 , 10

select count(*) from m_question_info q left join m_answer_info a on q.id = a.question_id and a.deleted = 0 and a.status = 2 left join m_question_type t on q.quest_type_id = t.id and t.deleted = 0 where q.deleted = 0 and q.status = 2
and t.name like concat(#{name} , '%')
and q.title like concat('%', #{title} , '%')

select q.id id , q.title title , q.content content , q.questioner_type qtype , b.contact_name name , concat('' , p.name , c.name) address , q.created_time qtime , a.content acontent , a.created_time atime , a.created_id acreater, t.id typeid , a.recommend , m.contact_name mcreateName, i.real_name ccreateName, a.answer_type atype , o.name oname from m_question_info q inner join m_answer_info a on q.id = a.question_id and a.deleted = 0 and a.status = 2 left join m_area_province p on p.code = q.province_id left join m_area_city c on c.code = q.city_id left join m_question_type t on t.id = q.quest_type_id and t.deleted = 0 left join m_member_info m on m.id = a.created_id left join m_member_info b on b.id = q.created_id left join c_manager_info i on i.id = a.created_id left join m_organization_info o on o.number = q.org_id where q.id = #{questid} and q.deleted =0 and q.status = 2 order by recommend desc
mapper.insert: insert into m_answer_info(created_time , content , modified_time , status , question_id , answer_type , created_id , modified_id , deleted) values(now() , #{acontent} , now() , 1 , #{questid} , #{type} , #{createid} , #{createid} , 0)
mapper.select: select count(*) from c_manager_info where deleted = 0
